skills.name: Null Pulse
skills.description: Releases a Null Pulse in the target direction. Deals X[Damage Rate: 50%] Physical Damage to enemies in range. Knocks enemies back 12m. Applies Silence. Applies 40% Slow for 3s.

skills.name: Overclocking Reflex
skills.description: Has a 35% chance to dodge Basic Attack damage.

skills.name: Shield Bash
skills.description: Charges forward with shield raised. Deals X[Damage Rate: 75%] Physical Damage to enemies in path. Stuns for 2s. Applies 50% Slow for 4s.

skills.name: Fortress
skills.description: Gains 15% additional Armor and Magic Resistance. Reduces incoming damage by 8%.

skills.name: Meteor Storm
skills.description: Calls down meteors in target area. Deals X[Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage to enemies in 6m radius. Applies Burn for 5s.

skills.name: Elemental Mastery
skills.description: Increases Magic Damage by 20%. Skills have 25% chance to apply random elemental effect.

skills.name: Shadow Strike
skills.description: Teleports behind target and strikes. Deals X[Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage. Always crits. Applies Bleed for 6s.

skills.name: Shadow Dance
skills.description: Gains 30% Movement Speed. After dealing damage, has 20% chance to enter stealth for 3s.

skills.name: Divine Blessing
skills.description: Blesses target ally. Heals for X[Healing Rate: 80%] and applies 25% damage bonus for 8s.

skills.name: Whirlwind Slash
skills.description: Spins rapidly dealing X[Damage Rate: 90%] Physical Damage to all enemies in 4m radius. Applies 30% Slow for 3s.

skills.name: Berserker Rage
skills.description: Gains 2% Attack Speed and 1% Physical Damage for each 10% missing health. Stacks up to 10 times.

skills.name: Shield of Conviction
skills.description: Grants Shield of Conviction to up to 5 allies within range for 6s. Targets with Shield of Conviction gain a [Target-based Max HP 30%] shield. During this time, 30% of the damage they deal is converted into Shield Value, increasing up to [Target-based Max HP 15%] maximum. If the shield remains intact after 6s, deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies. Damage from additional explosions is reduced to 15%.

skills.name: Defiant Resolve
skills.description: Gains immunity to control effects and 20% Damage Increase for 10s after obtaining any shield effect, while the shield is active (Cooldown: 20s).

skills.name: Astral Gate
skills.description: Generates an Astral Gate beneath the caster. After 3 seconds, it teleports up to 15 teammates within the team who are nearby to the target location. Upon arrival, deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies and inflicts Stun for 1s; allies gain a [Target-based Max HP 20%] Shield, with Movement Speed increased by 30%, lasting 4s. Targets who pass through the Astral Gate cannot be teleported again via the gate for 10s. Teleportation can cross terrain. If the destination is unreachable, teleport to the nearest valid position instead.

skills.name: Celestial Rotation
skills.description: Reduces the cooldown of all skills (not including Tactical Item skills) by 0.3s when this skill deals damage. (Cooldown: 0.5s)

skills.name: Skyward Leap
skills.description: Creates a protection zone at the target location that grants allies within +30% Damage Resistance, +40% Healing Received, +40% Dodge and heals for [Healing Rate: 60%] HP every second. Then leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to those hit and knocking them up for 1s. Immune to control during prep and leap

skills.name: Healing Guardian
skills.description: Gains 25% Damage Resistance for 6s if HP is below 75%. Sends healing radiation waves in all directions, healing allies in range for [Healing Rate: 60%] HP. (Cooldown: 20s)

skills.name: Tempest Slash
skills.description: Launches a flurry of slashes at the target and nearby enemies, each dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage. Damage reduces to 50% after the first hit on the same target. Flurry for 4s with control immunity and damage immunity. Can Critical Hit. Higher Attack Speed increases attack count.

skills.name: Cyclone Reap
skills.description: Critical hits have a 25% chance to trigger Cyclone Reap, dealing [Damage Rate: 80%] Physical Damage to all nearby enemies. Cooldown: 3s.

skills.name: Shackled Grip
skills.description: Channels for 4 seconds, creating chains that extend outward and create chain links on hit (maximum of 5 chains). Chains break at their range limit. During channeling, gains control immunity, 40% increased Damage Resistance, and 30% increased Movement Speed. After channeling ends, pulls all chained targets and deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage, stunning them for 1.5s. Jumping during channeling ends the skill early, dealing [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to enemies in range.

skills.name: Imprisonment
skills.description: When inflicting Forced Movement (Pull, Knockback) on enemies, creates a circular prison lasting 4s. Enemies touching the prison take [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage and are Immobilized until the prison ends (Cooldown: 20s)

skills.name: Protector's Radiance
skills.description: Creates a Guardian Field and channels for 6s, gaining immunity to control. Allies on the field gain +40% Max HP and immunity to Forced Movement (Pull, Knockback). Each 5000 total damage taken by allies grants 1 Energy stack, up to 5. Use again within 12s of starting the channeling to unleash absorbed energy, dealing [Damage Rate: 350%]-[Damage Rate: 700%] Magic Damage based on stacks and reducing Movement Speed by 30% for 4s

skills.name: Reflective Shield
skills.description: Taking damage equal to 10% of Max HP within 5s after skill cast grants 25% Damage Resistance for 6s. During this time, reflect Magic Damage equal to 65% + 1.5% of Max HP to the attacker. (Cooldown: 25s)

skills.name: Storm Pulse
skills.description: Activate an Electric Device for 8s. Electric Device hits up to 5 enemies every 0.5s for [Damage Rate: 40%] Physical Damage, reducing Armor by 8% for 8s. Stacks up to 10 times.

skills.name: Static Overdrive
skills.description: Basic Attacks grant 1 stack of Electric Charge. At 5 stacks, the next attack triggers EMP Blast, dealing [Damage Rate: 160%] Physical Damage to enemies in range.

skills.name: Spiral Strike
skills.description: Performs a spinning attack dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

skills.name: Elemental Flow
skills.description: Elemental skills have 20% reduced mana cost and 15% increased effectiveness.

skills.name: Swarm Command
skills.description: Summons a swarm of creatures that attack enemies in the target area for 10s.

skills.name: Hive Mind
skills.description: Summoned creatures gain 25% increased damage and move 30% faster.

skills.name: Reality Distortion
skills.description: Creates a distortion field that slows enemies by 40% and reduces their accuracy by 25% for 8s.

skills.name: Illusion Mastery
skills.description: Illusion skills last 50% longer and have 30% reduced mana cost.

skills.name: Genetic Cascade
skills.description: Initiates a Genetic Cascade on the target, lasting 15 seconds. When the target is an ally: Restores [Healing Rate: 30%] HP per second and applies Damage Increase by 3% for 5s, stacking up to 10 times. When the target is an enemy: Deals [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage per second and applies Damage Reduced by 3% for 5s, stacking up to 10 times. Initial link also affects caster: Restores [Healing Rate: 30%] HP per second to the caster and applies Damage Increase by 3% for 5s, stacking up to 10 times. Additional Connection: Another connection can be made to a different type of target that was not selected initially during the skill duration. Link Break Condition: The link breaks if the distance to the target exceeds 25 meters.

skills.name: Helical Convergence
skills.description: After dealing damage 5 times, creates two Yin Vortexes around the caster that deal [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage to enemies hit and reduce healing received by 5% for 4s. Stacks up to 3 times. (Cooldown: 0.5s) After healing 5 times, creates two Yang Vortexes around self that restore [Healing Rate: 60%] HP to allies hit and increase healing received by 5% for 4s. Stacks up to 3 times. (Cooldown: 0.5s)

skills.name: Abyssal Sovereignty
skills.description: Removes all control effects and gains [Submerge] for 2.5s. [Submerge]: Dives underground, becoming immune to all damage and control effects. Increases Movement Speed by 40% and recovers [Healing Rate: 58%] HP every second. Press skill again to exit [Submerge] early. Upon exiting [Submerge], deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies. Can be used while skills are disabled

skills.name: Hive Exaltation
skills.description: Dealing damage with a skill grants 1 stack of Swarm, restoring [Healing Rate: 9%] HP every 2s for 6s (stacks do not boost healing effect). During this time, Damage Resistance increases by 5%, stacking up to 5 times. (Cooldown: 0.5s)

effects.note: stacks do not boost healing effect

skills.name: Spectral Disguise
skills.description: Creates a Spectral Disguise granting Stealth to the caster and up to 15 nearby allies, increasing Damage Resistance by 25% for 8s. Using a skill, dealing damage or direct healing breaks Stealth for 4s before reapplying

skills.name: Echo Reflection
skills.description: Skill and Basic Attack hits from the rear deal [Damage Rate: 60%] additional Physical Damage (Cooldown: 0.3s). Basic Attack Damage Bonuses affect damage and basic attack critical hits can cause the damage to crit

effects.name: Basic Attack Damage Bonuses
effects.description: Basic Attack Damage Bonuses affect damage and basic attack critical hits can cause the damage to crit

skills.name: Acid Blast
skills.description: Sprays acid for 4s, releasing 4 random splatters of acid per second to form an Acid Zone that lasts 8.5s. Enemies inside are Slowed by 50%. Enemies entering the Acid Zone gain [Acid Blast] [Acid Blast]: Reduces Damage by 40%, cancels Stealth, and each stack deals [Damage Rate: 20%] Magic Damage every second for 6s. Stacks up to 3 times

skills.name: Corrosion Barrier
skills.description: After taking 5 instances of damage, releases acid outward, dealing [Damage Rate: 70%] Magic Damage to enemies in range, reducing their damage dealt by 25% and Movement Speed by 25% for 4s

skills.name: Frozen Maelstrom
skills.description: After a short charge, unleashes a Frost Maelstrom forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to enemies in range, applying Slow by 40% and reducing Attack Speed by 40% for 6s. The shockwave also deals additional [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to enemies in the direct front area and Freezes them for 3s.

skills.name: Fractured Ice
skills.description: After casting the skill, if damage is dealt within 5 seconds, increases Damage Resistance by 25% for 6s, while emitting cold mist around itself, dealing [Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage and reducing Attack Speed by 30% and movement speed by 30% per second for 4s. (Cooldown: 20s)

skills.name: Cannonade Mode
skills.description: Transforms into a Cannon Form for 25 seconds. During this time, Magic Resistance is increased by 80, can move slowly, and Basic Attack becomes Bombardment: Fires projectiles at targets beyond 8m that explode and deals [Damage Rate: 230%] Physical Damage to enemies hit

skills.name: Resolve
skills.description: While standing still, gain 1 stack of [Steadfast] every second [Steadfast]: +2% Critical Rate, +2% Damage Resistance for 2s. Stacks up to 15 times

skills.name: Mole's Escape
skills.description: Jumps backward 6 meters while throwing a robotic grappling hook in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 110%] Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and binding them for 10s. Enemies attempting to leave the binding range are pulled back to the center and take [Damage Rate: 142%] Magic Damage.

skills.name: Survivability Resilience
skills.description: Increases own weight limit by 200

skills.name: Twinlance Infusion
skills.description: Creates a Lunar Domain and channels for 8s. Enemies within are struck by starlight on skill use, taking [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage and losing 20 MP. Allies within recover 8 MP every second and gain [Target-based Max HP 15%] Shield lasting 4s. Skill cannot be interrupted. +20% Movement Speed while channeling

skills.name: Lunar Rebirth
skills.description: Every 2s restores Moonveil Max MP +1%MP to other allies within 12m

skills.name: Soul Feast
skills.description: Creates a Void Domain, enveloping the caster and up to 5 nearby enemies in void. Deals [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage to enemies in range every second. The domain lasts for 8s. Enemies under Wraith Possession are immune to Physical Damage, cannot perform Basic Attacks, have their Magic Damage Reduction reduced by 30%, and are Slowed by 30%. While under Wraith Possession, the caster is also immune to Physical Damage, can perform Basic Attacks, gains 35% Basic Attack Lifesteal, and ignores the Physical Damage immunity of other enemies under Wraith Possession. The caster's Wraith Possession state cannot be dispelled.

skills.name: Voidshape
skills.description: Converts Basic Attack Damage from Physical to Magic. Basic Attacks also reduce the enemy's Magic Resistance by 4% for 4s, stacking up to 10 times

skills.name: Flamecore Rampage
skills.description: Removes all current Plating values, dealing [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies and inflicting Hell Salvo, while also granting 55% Attack Speed, 30% Movement Speed, and 30% Critical Rate, and becoming Immune to Control Effects for 6s (this state cannot be dispelled)

skills.name: Hell Salvo's Embrace
skills.description: While without Plating, gains 5 Energy per second, and gains 5 Energy on Basic Attack Crit. When Energy reaches 100, restores [Target-based Max HP 15%] Plating values. While with Plating, gains [Target-based Max HP 3%] Plating values on Basic Attack Crit. Plating restored cannot exceed [Target-based Max HP 25%]. (Trigger Interval: 1 seconds)

skills.name: Raven's Gaze
skills.description: Select an enemy target to summon ravens. After 2 seconds, ravens dive to attack, dealing [Damage Rate: 210%] Magic Damage to up to 10 enemies in range, dispelling all buffs, shields, and HoT effects. Applies 50% Slow and reduces damage dealt by 50% for 6s. Targets cannot gain buffs, shields, or HoT effects during this time

skills.name: Summon Raven
skills.description: Skills dealing damage grant the caster Raven's Call. At 6 stacks, the next skill damage within 8s that hits an enemy target will summon ravens at the location, dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage to up to 5 enemies in range. This effect removes 1 stack of buffs from hit targets and restores [Healing Rate: 72%] HP to self. (Stack gain interval: 0.5; Raven's Call interval: 10s)

skills.name: Sanctification
skills.description: Creates an expanding Sanctification Field at the target location and channels for 5s. Cannot be interrupted while channeling. Cleanses all control effects and debuffs every 0.5s, from up to 20 allies in the field and restores [Healing Rate: 30%] HP

skills.name: Holy Covenant
skills.description: When healing with skills, the target gains 5% additional Damage Resistance for 4s. Stacks up to 6 times

skills.name: Hemophage
skills.description: Activates Crimson Vortex for 6s. Crimson Vortex deals [Damage Rate: 75%] Magic Damage to up to 5 enemies every second, healing the caster for 60% of damage dealt for players (and 30% for Mobs). Damage increases up to [Damage Rate: 150%] as HP drops

skills.name: Blood Contract
skills.description: Gains +4% Damage Resistance and +6% Attack Speed for every 10% HP lost.

skills.name: Shadow Cascade
skills.description: Gathers dark energy and channels for 4s, firing 5 dark energy spheres (a total of 25) every 0.8s toward the front. Each sphere deals [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage to enemies, applying [Dark Matter Venom] and reducing Healing Received by 8% for 6s. Stacks up to 5 times. The skill cannot be interrupted.

skills.name: Umbra Resonance
skills.description: Gains 5% Movement Speed for 3s when inflicting an enemy with a DoT effect, stacking up to 6 times

skills.name: Sandstorm Dominion
skills.description: Creates a Sandstorm around the caster, pushing all enemies outside. Channels for 6s with +45% Damage Resistance and control immunity. Enemies touching the wind field take [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage, have their buffs dispelled, and are Slowed by 60% for 4s. Also knocks them back 11m from center

skills.name: Sand Veil
skills.description: Creates a circular storm field around the caster for 4s when causing Forced Movement (Pull, Knockback). Deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage to enemies in the field, inflicting Silence and a 40% chance to miss Basic Attacks for 3s. (Cooldown: 20s)

skills.name: Bond of Light
skills.description: Links to 8 targets within 10m around the caster, channeling for 4s. Restores [Healing Rate: 48%] HP to the caster and linked allies every 0.5s, while dealing [Damage Rate: 70%] Magic Damage to linked enemies. Cannot be interrupted while channeling

skills.name: Light's Echo
skills.description: Other allies within 12m receive +20% healing

skills.name: Shadow Rift
skills.description: Expands an area centered on the caster, lasting 20s. Simultaneously disperses 8 Umbra Shadows that deal [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to enemies in their path. If more than one Shadow hits a target, the damage is reduced to 15% of the original value. While inside the area, Skills change to [Shadow Shift]. When touching a Shadow, Shadow Shift's Cooldown is reduced by 5s, grants [Target-based Max HP 10%] Shield, and increases Movement Speed by 20% for 4s. If the caster leaves the area, it immediately disappears. [Shadow Shift]: Teleports forward. The next 5 Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed by 60% for 6s.

skills.name: Umbra Kinetics
skills.description: Grants Basic Attacks a 30% chance to trigger a shadow strike for 6s, dealing [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage (Cooldown: 0.8s). Basic Attack Damage Bonuses affect damage and basic attack critical hits can cause the damage to crit

skills.name: Magma Slam
skills.description: Leaps to the target location. Gains immunity to control during leap. Deals [Damage Rate: 350%] Physical Damage and knocks enemies in the area up for 1.5s

skills.name: Seismic Impact
skills.description: When inflicting Immobilize or Hard Control (Stun, Fear, Freeze, Knockup, Petrify), drops a meteor after 1s, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and 30% Slow for 3s. (Cooldown: 5s)

skills.name: Serpent's Whisper
skills.description: Applies Serpent's Whisper to self or an ally. Cannot Move or cast Skills for 4s, gains Damage and Control Immunity, and deals [Damage Rate: 58%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies every 0.5s, inflicting [Creeping Stone] [Creeping Stone]: Lasts 1s, stacking up to 4 times; when max stacked, the target is Petrified for 2s. While Petrified, Armor is reduced by 25% (cannot obtain [Creeping Stone] for 6s) Can be used while Skills are disabled. Serpent's Whisper cannot be Dispelled

skills.name: Shedskin
skills.description: Retains 1 HP upon taking lethal damage, transforming into a spirit serpent, cleansing all negative effects (control, DoT, and debuffs), gaining immunity to control, debuffs and damage for 2s, and +100% Movement Speed, and healing 5% HP every 0.5s. (CD: 120s)

skills.name: Bloodstorm
skills.description: Channels for 5s, scattering 8 Blood Seeds (up to 40 total) around the caster every second. Each seed explodes 1.5s after landing, dealing [Damage Rate: 70%] Magic Damage to up to 5 enemies in range. If at least one enemy is hit by the explosion, the caster regenerates [Healing Rate: 15%] Vitality. Skill cannot be interrupted. Increases Movement Speed by 30% (decaying over time)

skills.name: Blood Curse
skills.description: When Skills or Basic Attacks deal direct damage, they apply Blood Curse to the target for 6s. 30% of the damage dealt to cursed targets will explode as True Damage when the curse ends, while also restoring [Healing Rate: 20%] Vitality to the caster. (Cooldown: 25s)

skills.name: Engulfing Shadows
skills.description: Enters Stealth and gains [Shadow Ward] and the skill [Phantom Bind] for 9 seconds. Shadow Ward: Grants [Target-based Max HP 25%] Shield. If Shadow Ward is dispelled, the Shadow Dive effect ends prematurely. Phantom Bind: Summon phantoms that track enemies in range, dealing [Damage Rate: 183%] Magic Damage and replenishing [Target-based Max HP 5%] Spectral Shield. Doesn't break Engulfing Shadows Stealth. Using any skill other than Phantom Bind, dealing direct healing or damage while in Stealth will break invisibility for 2 seconds before re-entering Stealth.

skills.name: Healing Bloom Hunter
skills.description: Enters Stealth when standing still unhurt and not using skills for a short duration. Taking damage, using skills, or moving breaks Stealth. Warning appears when enemies are within 7 to 14 meters. Stealth is lost if an enemy remains within 7 meters for over 3 seconds. Gains 3% HP per second while in any Stealth state

skills.name: Null Pulse
skills.description: Releases a Null Pulse in the target direction, dealing 49[Damage Rate: 50%] Physical Damage to enemies in range, knocking them back 12m, and applying Silence and 40% Slow for 3s.

skills.name: Overclocking Reflex
skills.description: Has a 35% chance to dodge Basic Attack damage

skills.name: Plague Outbreak
skills.description: [Plague]: Deals [Damage Rate: 20%] Magic Damage every 3s for 13s. Stacks up to 10 times. When a target affected by [Plague] dies, deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage to up to 5 other nearby enemies.

skills.name: Rot Manifest
skills.description: Doubles the enemy's [Plague] stacks and refreshes duration. If stacks exceed the limit, deals [Damage Rate: 55%] per stack Magic Damage for excess stacks. If target has no [Plague], inflicts at least 1 stack of [Plague] and deals [Damage Rate: 55%] Magic Damage.

skills.name: Touch of Plague
skills.description: Deals [Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage and applies [Plague]

skills.name: Plague Strike
skills.description: Releases a shockwave in target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage to enemies in its path and inflicting [Plague]

skills.name: Venom Pool
skills.description: Throws a pool of venom at the target location, lasting 3s, slowing enemies inside by 20% and inflicting [Plague] every second

skills.name: Scourge
skills.description: Deals [Damage Rate: 125%] Magic Damage to the enemy every 0.7s, inflicts [Plague], and restores [Healing Rate: 30%] HP. Cannot move while channeling

skills.name: Plague Surge
skills.description: Releases a plague surge in target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 160%] Magic Damage to enemies hit, inflicting 2 stacks of [Plague] and reducing Speed by 30% for 4s

skills.name: Spread Plague
skills.description: While active, consumes 10 MP every 3s and inflicts [Plague] to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks have a 30% chance to miss for 9s. Use again to deactivate. Automatically deactivates when MP is insufficient.

skills.name: Exhaustion
skills.description: Summons a draining field at the target location, lasting 6s. Slows enemies inside by 30% and inflicts [Exhaustion] every second for 6s, stacking up to 6 times

skills.name: Toxic Matter
skills.description: Launches Toxic Matter at target, bouncing to other enemies within 7m up to 9 times. Each target can be hit up to 2 times. Each hit deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage, inflicts 1 stack of [Plague] and reduces Magic Resistance by 64 for 6s.

skills.name: Crippling Curse
skills.description: Curses a circular area. After a brief delay, deals [Damage Rate: 250%] Magic Damage to up to 10 enemies in range, dispelling all Buffs, shields, and HoT effects, and inflicting [Crippled] for 6s

effects.name: Crippled
effects.description: Cannot use movement skills or gain buffs, shields, or HoT effects

skills.name: Amplify
skills.description: When casting skills, increases Magic Damage dealt by 20% for 6s. Trigger Interval: 30s

skills.name: Heal
skills.description: Instantly restores [Healing Rate: 120%] HP to nearby allies

skills.name: Abundance
skills.description: Increases Movement Speed by 50% and restores 8 MP every second for 5s

effects.name: Abundance
effects.description: Increases Movement Speed by 50% and restores 8 MP every second

skills.name: Parasitic Swarm
skills.description: Infects an enemy with [Parasites]. [Parasites]: Parasites last 12s and deal 50% True Damage whenever the target takes direct damage (minimum interval 0.8s). When dispelled, deals 350% Magic Damage.

effects.name: Parasites
effects.description: Deals 50% True Damage whenever target takes direct damage (minimum interval 0.8s). When dispelled, deals 350% Magic Damage

skills.name: Pestilence
skills.description: Infects any target with Pestilence Source for 8s. Every second, deals 65% Magic Damage to the infected and nearby enemies. Inflicts 1 stack of [Plague] and reduces damage dealt by 5% to enemies except the carrier for 4s, stacking up to 5 times.

effects.name: Pestilence Source
effects.description: Deals 65% Magic Damage every second to infected and nearby enemies

effects.name: Plague
effects.description: Reduces damage dealt by 5% per stack

skills.name: Hexbound Malice
skills.description: Inflict 2 stacks of [Plague] as well as [Hexbound Malice] to enemies in range, lasting 9s. [Hexbound Malice]: Each active skill used consumes 10 extra MP and inflicts 200% Magic Damage.

effects.name: Plague
effects.description: Reduces damage dealt by 5% per stack

effects.name: Hexbound Malice
effects.description: Each active skill used consumes 10 extra MP and inflicts 200% Magic Damage

skills.name: Bloom of Malice
skills.description: Plants a Bloom of Malice seed before channeling energy to it for 3s. The seed grows gradually until blooming (press skill again to bloom early). When blooming, deals 360% Magic Damage to nearby enemies, inflicts random amounts of [Plague] stacks lasting 12s, and reduces Max HP by 2.5% (stacks up to 10 times). Effects increase with growth time ([Plague] stacks 1–2 → 3–10 / Max HP reduction stacks 1 → 10).

effects.name: Plague
effects.description: Reduces damage dealt by 5% per stack

effects.name: Max HP Reduction
effects.stacks: up to 10 times (1 initial, 10 with growth)
effects.description: Reduces Max HP by 2.5% per stack

skills.name: Necrotic Eruption
skills.description: Deploys a Necrotic Eruption device at the target location. Every 2 seconds, it generates Death Clouds at random locations within the device's area (the device's range gradually expands), creating a total of 5 Death Clouds. Each Death Cloud lasts for 10s. Death Clouds deal 40% Magic Damage to enemies in range every second, inflicting [Plague], and reducing Healing Effect by 5% for 12s, stacking up to 5 times.

skills.name: Divine Ward
skills.description: Increases the resistances of allies within 9m by 15%

skills.name: Aegisflare
skills.description: Grants a shield of 25% of target's Max HP to the caster or an ally for 4s. When the shield breaks, deals 250% Magic Damage to nearby enemies.

effects.description: Grants shield based on target's Max HP
Deals damage when shield is destroyed

skills.name: Holy Feather
skills.description: Deals 90% Magic Damage. Can cast every 5s. Deals 150% Magic Damage to the target and heals 90% HP for up to 3 allies within 16m who have the lowest HP.

effects.target: up to 3 allies with lowest HP

skills.name: Holy Smite
skills.description: Calls down holy smite at the target location, dealing 80% Magic Damage to all players (160% Magic Damage to mobs). Heals the caster for 57% HP if hitting at least one enemy.

effects.trigger: if hitting at least one enemy

skills.name: Holy Heal
skills.description: Performs Holy Heal at the target location, restoring 108% HP to allies in range.

skills.name: Holy Wave
skills.description: Projects a holy wave in the target direction, dealing 200% Magic Damage to all players (300% Magic Damage to mobs) in its path. The wave automatically returns when reaching max range, healing up to 5 nearby allies for 90% HP.

skills.name: Divine Link
skills.description: Channels divine link on target for 6s, also granting the caster 15% of target's Max HP Shield for 4s. Can move slowly while channeling. When targeting an ally, heals them for 120% HP every second. When targeting an enemy, deals 100% Magic Damage every second.

skills.name: Holy Energy
skills.description: Projects holy energy at the target location. On impact, restores 90% HP and grants a 20% of target's Max HP shield for 4s to allies in range.

skills.name: Holy Wall
skills.description: Creates multiple holy walls in front. Enemies who touch them take 150% Magic Damage and are stunned for 1.5s, while the caster gains a 15% of target's Max HP shield for 6s.

skills.name: Holy Baptism
skills.description: Cleanses all Slow and Immobilize effects and 2 Debuff effects from the caster and up to 20 nearby allies and restores 120% HP. Also prevents the next 3 Immobilize and Immune to Slow effects within 4s.

effects.target: caster and up to 20 nearby allies
caster and up to 20 nearby allies
caster and up to 20 nearby allies

effects.name: Immobilize Immunity
effects.target: caster and up to 20 nearby allies

effects.name: Slow Immunity
effects.target: caster and up to 20 nearby allies

skills.name: Sacred Flare
skills.description: Casts holy radiance at the target location. Heals allies in range for [Healing Rate: 120%] HP and deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to enemies, knocking them back 7m from the center. Gives enemies 60% chance to miss Basic Attacks and reveals Stealth for 6s

skills.name: Sanctified Domain
skills.description: Creates a holy domain that deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to enemies in range and knocks them back 10m. Channels for 3s, healing allies in range for [Healing Rate: 60%] HP every 0.5s and increasing their Damage Resistance by 10% for 6s. Stacks up to 3 times

skills.name: Sanctum Arc
skills.description: Launches a Holy Chain that bounces to the nearest ally within 9 meters after hitting an ally, restoring [Healing Rate: 120%] HP with each hit. It deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage to up to 5 enemies in range, with damage reduced to 20% for subsequent explosions. The chain can bounce up to 9 times, and each target can be hit a maximum of 3 times

skills.name: Divine Vault
skills.description: Leaps to the target location. Upon landing, deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to enemies in range and knocks them up for 0.75s. Heals allies in range for [Healing Rate: 180%] HP and increases their Dodge by 30% for 6s

skills.name: Sanctuary
skills.description: Cleanses an ally or the caster of all Slow and Immobilize effects, heals [Healing Rate: 360%] HP and grants Sanctuary for 5s. Sanctuary grants immunity to Slow and Immobilize, and prevents HP from falling below 1. Each 10% of missing HP increases healing received by 5%. Sanctuary cannot be dispelled

effects.description: Immunity to Slow and Immobilize, prevents HP from falling below 1, increases healing received by 5% per 10% missing HP, cannot be dispelled

skills.name: Blessed Halo
skills.description: Creates a Blessed Halo at the target location. After 1s, heals all allies in range for [Healing Rate: 360%] HP, cleanses all control effects and 5 debuffs, and grants immunity to Control and Slow for 4s

skills.name: Frost Torrent
skills.description: Channels for 3s, releasing frost winds in the target direction that deal [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage to players ([Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to mobs) every 0.5s and reduce Movement Speed by 30% for 3s. Can move slowly while channeling.

skills.name: Ice Shards
skills.description: Removes control effects and summons 6 ice shards to orbit the caster for 10s. While active, gain 40% Casting Speed and +25% Damage Resistance. When other weapon skills deal damage, a shard fires at the target, dealing [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage and reducing their Attack Speed by 10% for 4s. Stacks up to 4 times

skills.name: Frozen Phase
skills.description: Launches a frost orb in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage per second to enemies in range and applying 30% Slow for 3s. For 4s, the skill can be recast to blink the caster to the current orb's location, dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies and Freezing them for 1.5s. Allies in range gain a [Target-based Max HP 15%] Shield for 4s. While the shield is active, taking Basic Attack Damage applies [Frost] to the source of damage. [Frost]: Reduces Attack Speed and Movement Speed by 30% for 4s

skills.name: Frost Nova
skills.description: Places a Frost Nova at the target location, lasting 15s. When triggered by an enemy, deals [Damage Rate: 250%] Magic Damage and reduces Movement Speed by 35% and 15% reduced healing for 6s. Gains 1 charge every 15s, up to 3 charges

skills.name: Frostbound Echo
skills.description: Fires an ice bolt at the target, dealing [Damage Rate: 160%] Magic Damage, slowing by 30% and inflicting [Frigid] for 4s. The bolt then bounces up to 9 times within 9m to random enemies. Bounces to the caster if there are no enemies in range, granting [Target-based Max HP 10%] Shield value for 4s. While the shield is active, inflict [Frost] onto any attacker that hits with basic attacks. [Frost]: Reduces Attack Speed and Movement Speed by 30% for 4s. [Frigid]: At 3 stacks, Freezes for 1.5s

skills.name: Frostbite
skills.description: Creates a freezing cyclone at the target location, lasting 5s. Enemies inside are Slowed by 60% and take [Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage every second

skills.name: Frost's Caller
skills.description: Empowers with extreme cold energy for 20s, granting immunity to Slow and Immobilize effects, and obtaining the [Frost Slash] and [Frost Drift] skills. --[Frost Slash]--: Fires an ice blade forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage to enemies along the path and applying 1 stack of [Hypothermia] and 30% Slow for 4s. After firing two ice blades, the third ice blade's damage increases to [Damage Rate: 145%] Magic Damage. When [Hypothermia] reaches 6 stacks, the target gains [Deep Frost]. [Deep Frost]: Cannot perform Basic Attacks or Move. Lasts 1.5s. --[Frost Drift]--: Instantly removes control effects and leaps in the target direction

effects.name: Frost Empowerment
effects.description: Grants immunity to Slow and Immobilize effects, and provides access to Frost Slash and Frost Drift skills

effects.name: Frost Slash
effects.description: Fires an ice blade dealing Magic Damage to enemies along the path

effects.name: Hypothermia
effects.description: Applies stacking debuff that can lead to Deep Frost immobilization

effects.name: Deep Frost
effects.description: Immobilizes target, preventing Basic Attacks and Movement

effects.name: Frost Drift
effects.description: Removes control effects and provides mobility

skills.name: Ice Blast
skills.description: Creates a frost crystal at the target location that forms after 0.7s, dealing [Damage Rate: 75%] Magic Damage and Freezing enemies for 1.5s. After 1s, the crystal shatters, dealing [Damage Rate: 400%] Magic Damage, and reducing Movement Speed by 40% and Attack Speed by 40% for 6s

skills.name: Frost Armor
skills.description: Passive skill that provides defensive benefits to Frost weapons

effects.name: Frost Armor
effects.description: Provides defensive benefits while wielding Frost weapons

skills.name: Ice Burst
skills.description: [Normal Skill]: Deals [Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage. Can cast [Ice Burst] every 5s. Deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage to the enemy and Immobilizes them for 1.5s.

skills.name: Frostbite Zone
skills.description: Creates a zone of deep frost in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 130%] Magic Damage to enemies in range and Slowing them by 25% for 4s.

skills.name: Frost Burst
skills.description: Creates three Frost Bursts that fly toward the target direction after a brief delay, each dealing [Damage Rate: 110%] Magic Damage to enemies hit. Additional frost shards beyond the first deal damage equal to 25% of the original damage.

skills.name: Frost Beam
skills.description: Channels for 3s, continuously firing a frost beam in the target direction that deals [Damage Rate: 60%] Magic Damage to players ([Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage to mobs) every 0.5s to those hit and inflicts [Frost Beam Slow] for 3s, stacking up to 5 times.

effects.name: Frost Beam Slow
effects.description: Movement Speed Bonus: -8% (-8% per stack, can stack)

skills.name: Crystal Frost
skills.description: Launches crystalline frost in the target direction. Upon hitting the first enemy, it explodes to deal [Damage Rate: 250%] Magic Damage and Immobilize enemies in range for 2s

skills.name: Frost Blink
skills.description: Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies and Freezes them for 0.5s, then blinks in the target direction.

skills.name: Frost Wall
skills.description: Creates a frost wall before the caster that lasts 8s. Enemies inside are Slowed by 70%, take [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage every second, and gain [Chill] stacks. Stacks up to 2 times. [Chill]: At max stacks, enemies are Frozen for 1.5s and become immune to [Chill] for 6s

effects.name: Chill
effects.description: At max stacks, enemies are Frozen for 1.5s and become immune to [Chill] for 6s

skills.name: Frost Roar
skills.description: Unleashes a freezing roar in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage and knocking enemies back 14m. Reduces Movement Speed by 30% and Attack Speed by 30% for 4s.

effects.name: Frost Roar Debuff
effects.description: Reduces Movement Speed by 30% and Attack Speed by 30%

skills.name: Burst
skills.description: Damage dealt by the carrier inflicts a status effect called [Burn]. [Burn] deals 25% Magic Damage every second for 8 seconds. [Burn] can stack up to 6 times, but these stacks do not boost the damage of the individual [Burn] effect. When [Burn] reaches its maximum stacks (6 stacks), it triggers an additional effect: it deals 80% Magic Damage to up to 5 enemies near the carrier and then removes all existing [Burn] stacks from the target.

skills.name: Magma Burst
skills.description: Deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage and applies 1 stack of [Burn].

skills.name: Scorching Shard
skills.description: Fires 3 Scorching Shards in the target direction. Deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage to enemies and inflicts 1 stack of [Burn]. Additional shard hits on the same target beyond the first deal damage equal to 25% of the original damage.

skills.name: Wildfire Shard
skills.description: Fires a wildfire shard at the target location that bounces forward twice before exploding at the final position, dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage to enemies in range and inflicting 1 stack of [Burn]

skills.name: Inferno Blast
skills.description: Continuously channels flames in target direction for 3s, dealing [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage ([Damage Rate: 75%] to mobs) and inflicting [Burn] to all enemies in range every 0.5s. Can rotate but cannot move while channeling

skills.name: Molten Orb
skills.description: Launches a molten orb in target direction that sticks to the first enemy hit, lasting 5s and dealing [Damage Rate: 110%] Magic Damage to enemies within 5m every 2s while inflicting 1 stack of [Burn]

skills.name: Blast Jump
skills.description: Jumps in target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Magic Damage and inflicting 2 stacks of [Burn] to nearby enemies upon takeoff

skills.name: Oil Zone
skills.description: Spreads an Oil Zone in front of the caster, lasting 8s, inflicting [Oil Coated] on enemies entering the area. [Oil Coated]: Slows enemies by 50% for 4s. If [Burn] is applied while under this effect, [Oil Coated] immediately changes to [Volatile Burn], and the target cannot obtain [Oil Coated] again for 6s. [Volatile Burn]: Fears enemies and deals [Damage Rate: 56%] Magic Damage every 0.5s for 1.5s.

skills.name: Overdrive Mode
skills.description: Activates Overdrive Mode, increasing Casting Speed by 60% and Magic Damage by 20%. Consumes 4 MP every second Use the skill again to deactivate Overdrive. Automatically deactivates when MP is insufficient

skills.name: Hellfire
skills.description: Launches scorching flames at the target location to create Hellfire. Hellfire lasts 6s, dealing [Damage Rate: 70%] Magic Damage to all players ([Damage Rate: 140%] Magic Damage to mobs) within and inflicting 1 stack of [Burn] every second

skills.name: Hell Salvo
skills.description: Channels for 3s, continuously firing at target. Each projectile deals [Damage Rate: 40%] Magic Damage to enemies hit, inflicts 1 stack of [Burn], and reduces Magic Resistance by 27 for 4s. Stacks up to 6 times

skills.name: Core Flare
skills.description: Launches 3 Core Flare orbs at the target location. Each nova deals [Damage Rate: 180%] Magic Damage to enemies along the way. Inflicts 1 stack of [Burn] and 1 stack of [Scorch]. Additional nova hits on the same target deal damage equal to 30% of the original damage. Gains 1 charge every 15s, up to 3 charges.

effects.name: Scorch
effects.description: Reduces healing received by 5% for 4s. Stacks up to 3 times

skills.name: Scorching Surge
skills.description: Launches three scorching surges at the target location. After 1s, the flames erupt, each dealing [Damage Rate: 240%] Magic Damage and inflicting 1 stack of [Burn] and Knockup for 1s to enemies in range. Damage reduces to 50% for enemies that take damage from more than one scorching surge

skills.name: Molten Blast
skills.description: Fires a Molten Blast in target direction that explodes on impact with the first target, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Magic Damage and inflicting 1 stack of [Burn]. Can be charged. At 2s charge time, the Molten Blast becomes empowered, dealing [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage, inflicting 2 stacks of [Burn], and applying Knockback to enemies within the explosion range by 8m. Gains 1 charge every 18s, up to 2 charges

skills.name: Molten Volley
skills.description: Enter Molten Volley Mode for 20s. Cannot move while active but can cancel manually. Basic Attack replaced: Fires magma at the target location that rolls forward after impact, dealing [Damage Rate: 165%] Magic Damage to enemies along the way and inflicting 1 stack of [Burn]. Damage increases by 8% after each enemy hit, up to 40%

skills.name: Starforge Beam
skills.description: Channels a starforge beam for 4s. Deals [Damage Rate: 85%] Magic Damage to enemies in range every 0.5s, inflicting 1 stack of [Burn] and [Scorch]. Each hit increases damage by 10%, up to 50%. Cannot be interrupted during channeling and grants a [Target-based Max HP 25%] shield. [Scorch]: Reduces healing received by 5% for 4s. Stacks up to 3 times

effects.name: Scorch
effects.description: Reduces healing received by 5% for 4s. Stacks up to 3 times

skills.name: Natural Armor
skills.description: Gains 1 stack of Natural Armor every 5s, stacking up to 4 times. Each stack increases Damage Resistance by 8%. 1 stack is lost for each instance of damage taken.

skills.name: Evil Seed
skills.description: [Normal Skill]: Deals [Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage. Throws an [Evil Seed] after 5 Basic Attacks. Throws an Evil Seed at the target location, creating a thorn zone that lasts 5s. The zone deals [Damage Rate: 40%] Magic Damage every second to up to 5 enemies and reduces their Movement Speed by 25%

skills.name: Soothing Mist
skills.description: Releases soothing mist in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 70%] Magic Damage to enemies along the path and applies 1 stack of [Recovery] to allies. [Recovery]: Restores HP every second for 12s, stacking up to 3 times. HP recovery at 1 | 2 | 3 stacks: [Healing Rate: 12%] | [Healing Rate: 18%] | [Healing Rate: 24%]

skills.name: Healing Seed
skills.description: Throws a Healing Seed at the target location that blooms, restoring [Healing Rate: 66%] HP to allies in range and applying 1 stack of [Recovery]. [Recovery]: Recovers HP every second for 12s, stacking up to 3 times. HP recovery at 1 | 2 | 3 stacks: [Healing Rate: 12%] | [Healing Rate: 18%] | [Healing Rate: 24%]

skills.name: Winding Vines
skills.description: After a brief delay, creates an entangling zone lasting 4s. Deals [Damage Rate: 90%] Magic Damage every second and immobilizes enemies that enter for 1.5s

skills.name: Energize
skills.description: Creates an energizing aura around the caster, lasting 5s. Restores [Healing Rate: 39%] HP and 6 MP every second to up to 10 nearby allies

skills.name: Vitality Seed
skills.description: Applies Vitality Seeds to up to 5 nearby allies, healing for [Healing Rate: 96%] HP and applying 1 stack of [Recovery]. Vitality Seeds increase Attack Speed by 25% and Casting Speed by 40% for 6s. [Recovery]: Restores HP every second for 12s, stacking up to 3 times. HP recovery at 1 | 2 | 3 stacks: [Healing Rate: 12%] | [Healing Rate: 18%] | [Healing Rate: 24%]

skills.name: Freshness
skills.description: Cleanses all Hard Control (Stun, Fear, Freeze, Knockup, Petrify, Sleep), Silence, and 2 DoT effects on the caster and up to 20 nearby allies. Also heals for [Healing Rate: 72%] HP, applies 1 stack of [Recovery], and prevents the next 3 Hard Control or Silence effects. The effect lasts 4s. Can be used while skills are disabled. [Recovery]: Restores HP every second for 12s, stacking up to 3 times. HP recovery at 1 | 2 | 3 stacks: [Healing Rate: 12%] | [Healing Rate: 18%] | [Healing Rate: 24%]

skills.name: Regenerate
skills.description: Releases restorative energy at the target location, healing allies. Healing amount increases based on target's [Recovery] stacks. [Recovery] stacks: 0 | 1 | 2 | 3. Recovers HP: [Healing Rate: 90%] | [Healing Rate: 114%] | [Healing Rate: 138%] | [Healing Rate: 162%]

skills.name: Crater Surge
skills.description: Creates 3 Crater Surges in the target area. Each surge deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Magic Damage to players ([Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to mobs). The caster is healed for [Healing Rate: 72%] HP if at least one enemy is hit

skills.name: Toxin Injection
skills.description: Inflicts natural toxins on the target, dealing [Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage every second while reducing Attack Speed by 30% and Movement Speed by 30% for 4s. The toxin's duration is refreshed whenever the target takes damage from the caster's Weapon Skills.

skills.name: Entangling Growth
skills.description: Launches Entangling Root Beetles toward the target. Upon hitting an enemy, they bounce to other enemies within 7 meters up to 9 times, with a maximum of 3 hits on the same target. Each hit deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage, inflicts Stun for 1s; and reduces damage dealt by 20% for 9s.

skills.name: Healing Bloom
skills.description: Creates a Healing Bloom aura. Allies within gain 15% increased healing. Consumes 3 MP every second to restore [Healing Rate: 27%] HP to nearby allies

skills.name: Rain of Serenity
skills.description: Creates a Rain of Serenity at the target location for 8s. Allies in the rain gain 25% Damage Resistance and recover [Healing Rate: 30%] HP every second, while enemies take [Damage Rate: 50%] Magic Damage every second.

skills.name: Thorn Barrier
skills.description: Grants Thorn Barrier to up to 5 nearby allies. Thorn Barrier increases Damage Resistance by 20%, Attack Speed by 25%, and Casting Speed by 40% for 6s. When taking direct damage, recovers [Healing Rate: 66%] HP up to 6 times; also Slows the attacker by 25% for 3s.

skills.name: Divine Rootfall
skills.description: Plants a Divine Rootfall that lasts 20s. After 1s, the tree matures and restores [Healing Rate: 24%] HP every second to nearby allies. When enemies cast skills in range, it shoots sleep seeds that deal [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage and inflict Sleep for 2.5s. The tree is destroyed after taking 10 Basic Attack hits

skills.name: Breeze of Resurgence
skills.description: Heals all allies hit for [Healing Rate: 210%], cleansing all control effects and 5 DoT stacks. Also grants immunity to DoTs and increases healing received by 35% for 6s

skills.name: Bleed
skills.description: Dealing damage inflicts [Bleed], dealing [Damage Rate: 30%] Physical Damage every second for 8s, stacking up to 6 times (stacks do not boost damage). At max stacks, triggers Hemorrhage, dealing [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage + True Damage equal to 4% of the target's current HP and removes all [Bleed] stacks. Basic Attack Damage Bonuses affect the base damage and basic attack critical hits can cause the damage to crit

skills.name: Bleeding Thrust
skills.description: [Basic Attack]: Deals [Damage Rate: 85%] Physical Damage and applies 1 stack of [Bleed]. Can cast [Bleeding Thrust] every 6s. Dashes toward an enemy, dealing [Damage Rate: 160%] Physical Damage and inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed]

skills.name: Ricocheting Blades
skills.description: [Basic Attack]: Deals [Damage Rate: 85%] Physical Damage and applies 1 stack of [Bleed]. Can cast [Ricochet] every 6s. Throws a blade at the target that deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage, inflicts 1 stack of [Bleed] and reduces their Movement Speed by 40% for 2s. After which it bounces to 1 enemy behind up to 4 times

skills.name: Armor Breaker
skills.description: [Basic Attack]: Deals [Damage Rate: 85%] Physical Damage and applies 1 stack of [Bleed]. Can cast [Armor Breaker] every 5s. Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies, inflicting 1 stack of [Bleed], and reducing their Armor by 32 for 4s

skills.name: Whirling Blades
skills.description: Throws 3 blades forward. Each blade deals [Damage Rate: 80%] Physical Damage to all enemies hit. Upon reaching max range, the blades return, dealing [Damage Rate: 80%] Physical Damage to those hit and inflicting 1 stack of [Bleed]. Additional blade hits on the same enemy beyond the first deal damage equal to 30% of the original damage

skills.name: Phase Blade
skills.description: Dashes 3m backward while firing a Phase Blade forward that deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage to the first enemy hit, inflicting 1 stack of [Bleed] and Stunning for 0.75s, while also marking them for 5s. Recast the skill within 15m while a mark exists to instantly appear behind the target, dealing [Damage Rate: 160%] Physical Damage and gaining +30% Attack Speed for 5s

skills.name: Crippling Strike
skills.description: Strike an enemy 2 times, dealing [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage, applying 1 stack of [Bleed] and Disarming them for 4s. Increases Basic Attack Damage by 25% for 5s

skills.name: Smoke Grenade
skills.description: Throws a smoke grenade to create a smoke screen for 6s. Enemies inside are Slowed by 40% and have a 55% chance to miss Basic Attacks. Also deals [Damage Rate: 25%] Physical Damage every second

skills.name: Shadow Move
skills.description: Instantly removes control effects and enters Stealth. While in Stealth, gains immunity to movement-limiting effects (Slow, Immobilize) for 2s. Also increases damage by 7% for 6s, stacking up to 2 times. Can be recast once within 6s, but doing so will not remove control effects again. Using a skill, dealing or taking damage, or direct healing breaks Stealth

skills.name: Rend and Reap
skills.description: Leaps to the target and strikes, dealing [Damage Rate: 220%] Physical Damage and applying 2 stacks of [Bleed]. Recovers [Healing Rate: 132%] HP. Gains 1 charge every 20s, up to 2 charges

skills.name: Crimson Frenzy
skills.description: Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage + True Damage equal to 10% of the target's Max HP to nearby enemies, while also inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed]. If this skill triggers Hemorrhage, recovers 10% of Max HP and gains 40%+ Movement Speed for 3s

skills.name: Rupture Thrust
skills.description: Thrusts in the target's direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 140%] Physical Damage and inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed]. Skill's second stage can be cast within 5s: Dash toward the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 225%] Physical Damage and inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed] to all enemies hit. Deals [Damage Rate: 450%] Physical Damage against enemies with less than 40% HP

skills.name: Soul Snare
skills.description: Inflicts the enemy with a Soul Snare, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and linking with the target, silencing both parties for 5s. During this period, the caster gains [Soul Snare]. The link breaks if distance exceeds 12m. [Soul Snare]: Critical Rate: +30%, Damage Resistance: +50%, Attack Speed: +30%, Cannot use skills

skills.name: Blade Dance
skills.description: Dashes toward the target direction, leaving a dagger behind. Upon arrival, deals [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage and drains 25 MP from nearby enemies, inflicting 2 stacks of Bleed. Can be recast within 5s to return to the dagger's location, dealing [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage and draining 25 MP from nearby enemies, inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed]

skills.name: Bloodeye Burst
skills.description: Dashes forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to all enemies hit, inflicting 2 stacks of [Bleed], and reducing Damage Resistance by 20% for 4s. Skill's second stage can be cast within 5s: Deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to enemies in a frontal cone, inflicts 3 stacks of [Bleed] while also leaping backward

skills.name: Sanguine Pounce
skills.description: Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 320%] Physical Damage and applying 3 stacks of [Bleed] and [Healing Reduction] to nearby enemies upon landing, lasting for 4s. Enemies hit cannot be affected by [Healing Reduction] from Sanguine Pounce for 8s. If this skill triggers Hemorrhage, the cooldown is reduced to 12 seconds. [Healing Reduction]: Cannot receive healing

skills.name: Spear Scar
skills.description: Using a weapon skill grants [Spear Scar]: The next 3 Basic Attacks gain +60% Attack Speed, +2.5m range, and +30% Basic Attack Lifesteal. This effect lasts 6s. Also has a 45% chance to grant [Target-based Max HP 15%] Shield for 2s

effects.description: Next 3 Basic Attacks gain +60% Attack Speed, +2.5m range, and +30% Basic Attack Lifesteal for 6s. 45% chance to grant [Target-based Max HP 15%] Shield for 2s.

skills.name: Leap Strike
skills.description: Deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage to the target. Can cast [Leap Strike] every 5s, charging toward the enemy, dealing [Damage Rate: 170%] Physical Damage and increasing Attack Speed by 20% for 4s.

skills.name: Piercing Spear
skills.description: Deals [Damage Rate: 80%] Physical Damage to the target. Performs a piercing spear throw toward the target after 5 Basic Attacks, dealing [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage to enemies along the path and increases own Movement Speed by 20% for 2s.

skills.name: Sweeping Strike
skills.description: Deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage to the target. Can cast [Sweeping Strike] every 5s, dealing [Damage Rate: 240%] Physical Damage to enemies in range, each enemy hit increasing Damage Resistance by 6% for 4s. Stacks up to 5 times.

skills.name: Lance Thrust
skills.description: Repeatedly thrusts at enemies in a frontal cone 4 times, dealing [Damage Rate: 60%] Physical Damage per hit, then slashes forward to deal [Damage Rate: 130%] Physical Damage to enemies in range

skills.name: Lance Impale
skills.description: Throws a Lance Impale at the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 160%] Physical Damage to enemies in range and slowing them by 25% for 3s. The lance remains at the target location for 6s. Moving to the lance's position retrieves it, granting +20% Movement Speed and +20% Attack Speed for 4s. Gains 1 charge every 12s, up to 2 charges.

skills.name: Warding Flourish
skills.description: Channels for 4s, gaining Control Immunity and +60% Damage Resistance. While channeling, reflects 80% Physical Damage back to attackers when taking damage. Deals [Damage Rate: 40%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies every 0.5s. Recast again while channeling to charge forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to enemies hit and reducing their Armor by 64 for 4s

skills.name: Skyward Lance
skills.description: Deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to enemies in front and inflicts Knockup for 1s. Can be recast within 6s to slam down, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to enemies in range and reducing their Movement Speed by 45% for 3s.

skills.name: Lance Recall
skills.description: Instantly removes Control effects, deals [Damage Rate: 280%] Physical Damage to enemies in front, and leaps back 8m. Increases Movement Speed by 30% for 4s. Can be used while skills are disabled.

skills.name: Bloodeye Burst
skills.description: Strikes continuously, dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage to players ([Damage Rate: 240%] Physical Damage to mobs). The final strike deals [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage to players ([Damage Rate: 360%] Physical Damage to mobs). Each hit reduces Armor by 22 for 6s, stacking up to 4 times

skills.name: Rapid Thrust
skills.description: Charges forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 67%] Physical Damage to all enemies hit. Upon reaching the destination, performs 3 strikes, each dealing [Damage Rate: 67%] Physical Damage. Each strike that hits at least one enemy restores [Healing Rate: 67%] HP. Can be cast again within 6s

skills.name: Aegis Arc
skills.description: Sweeps around the caster, dealing [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to enemies in range and knocking them back 8m. Increases own Damage Resistance by 50% for 6s. Also creates a Disruption Field that lasts 8s. Enemies within 8m are Slowed by 30% and take 20% less Damage.

skills.name: Surgin Throw
skills.description: Charges at the enemy, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and inflicting Stun for 1s (ignores Control Resistance). Throws the target backward, dealing [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to enemies in the landing area and reducing their Movement Speed by 30% for 3s.

skills.name: Banner of Justice
skills.description: Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage and inflicting Immobilize for 2.5s to enemies in range upon landing. Plants a Banner of Justice that lasts 8s. Allies within its area gain 30% Damage Resistance and 35% Attack Speed.

skills.name: Shadow Dash
skills.description: Dashes in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 260%] Physical Damage and inflicting Knockup for 1s. Inflicts Disarm and reduces Movement Speed by 30% for 4s. Gains 1 charge every 18s, up to 2 charges.

skills.name: Blightfall
skills.description: Throws a Blightfall Spear at the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to enemies in range upon impact and reducing their Max HP by 15% for 4s. Also generates a Corrosion Field that expands slowly over 5s, slowing enemies within it by 40% and dealing [Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage per second to those inside. Gains 1 charge every 25s, up to a maximum of 2 charges.

skills.name: Target Mark
skills.description: When using weapon skills or Basic Attacks to deal damage, apply an additional [Target Mark] to the target for 8s. [Target Mark] is activated and fires a tracking arrow when stacked to 5 layers, dealing [Damage Rate: 90%] Physical Damage to the target, applying Slow by 25% for 2s, granting +25% Movement Speed for 2s, and increasing the range of the next 3 Basic Attacks by 3m for 6s. Damage is affected by Basic Attack Damage Boost and can Crit based on Basic Attack Crit Rate. Removes [Target Mark] after triggering.

skills.name: Venom Arrow
skills.description: [Basic Attack]: Deals [Damage Rate: 80%] Physical Damage to the target. Every 6th Basic Attack becomes [Venom Arrow], dealing [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage and inflicts [Venom]. [Venom]: Deals [Damage Rate: 15%] Magic Damage every second for 6s. Stacks up to 3 times.

skills.name: Split Arrow
skills.description: Replaces Basic Attack with [Split Arrow]. Deals [Damage Rate: 80%] Physical Damage to up to 5 enemies in a frontal cone.

skills.name: Piercing Arrow
skills.description: Replaces Basic Attack with [Piercing Arrow]. Fires an arrow forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage and reducing Armor by 5333% for 4s to all enemies hit. Range increases with charge time.

skills.name: Binding Arrow
skills.description: Fires three binding arrows forward. The first player hit by each takes [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage ([Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to mobs) and is Immobilized for 1.5s. Gains 1 charge every 14s, up to 2 charges.

skills.name: Sleeper Arrow
skills.description: Fires a Sleeper Arrow forward and leaps 14m backward. Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to the first enemy hit and inflicts Sleep for 5s.

skills.name: Blast Arrow
skills.description: Gains 10 explosive arrows for 12s. When Basic Attacks or skill arrows hit enemies, deal [Damage Rate: 40%] Physical Damage to up to 5 nearby enemies. Explosive Arrow only inflicts [Target Mark] on the target.

skills.name: Silencing Arrow
skills.description: Fires a silencing arrow forward. The first enemy hit takes [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage. After 2s, the arrow inflicts [Damage Rate: 180%] additional Magic Damage and applies Silence for 4s to enemies within 5m.

skills.name: Frost Arrow
skills.description: Gains 10 frost arrows for 12s. Basic Attacks and skill arrows deal [Damage Rate: 50%] additional Magic Damage and inflict 40% Slow for 2s on hit.

skills.name: Barrage
skills.description: Rains arrows down at the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage to players ([Damage Rate: 270%] Physical Damage to mobs) and inflicting 30% Slow for 3s. Gains 1 charge every 12s, up to 3 charges.

skills.name: Windrend Splitters
skills.description: Fires three Windrend Splitters forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage, reducing Attack Speed by 35% for 4s, and knocking targets back 5m. Enemies knocked into terrain are Stunned for 2.5s. Additional arrow hits on the same target beyond the first deal damage equal to 30% of the original damage.

skills.name: Arcbolt
skills.description: Fires an Arcbolt in the target direction. Upon hitting enemies, it immediately explodes, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to enemies in range and generating a Thunderstorm Field that attaches to them. The Thunderstorm Field lasts 8s, dealing [Damage Rate: 45%] Physical Damage every second to enemies within 6m and applying Armor Reduction of 33 for 4s. This effect can stack up to 5 times. The explosion can apply 3 stacks of [Target Mark], but the Thunderstorm Field does not apply [Target Mark] to the target.

skills.name: Powershot
skills.description: Charges and fires a single powerful arrow, dealing [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to a single target. Damage increases by 10% for every 1m traveled.

skills.name: Splintershot
skills.description: Gains 18 Splintershot and +30% Attack Speed for 20s. Basic Attacks fire 2 additional arrows (in addition to the Basic Attack), each dealing [Damage Rate: 30%] Magic Damage. Only one Splintershot per attack will inflict [Target Mark].

effects.description: Only one Splintershot per attack will inflict [Target Mark]

skills.name: Shadow Vortex
skills.description: Fires a Shadow Vortex in the target direction. The first enemy hit takes [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage. After 0.5s, the vortex shrinks and inflicts [Damage Rate: 280%] Magic Damage to enemies within 7m, pulls them to the center, Slows them by 40% for 3s, and inflicts 3 stacks of [Target Mark]. Gains 1 charge every 15s, up to 2 charges.

skills.name: Severance Shot
skills.description: Shoots 3 Severance Shots in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to enemies hit along the path, reducing their healing received by 20% for 4s. Additional Severance Shot hits on the same enemy beyond the first deal damage equal to 30% of the original damage. Gains 1 charge every 12s, up to 3 charges.

skills.name: Reload
skills.description: Automatically reloads ammunition over time. Gain 1 bullet every 2 seconds. Maximum 6 bullets.

skills.name: Headshot
skills.description: Aim for the head, dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage. Critical hits deal 150% damage.

skills.name: Ricochet
skills.description: Fire a bullet that bounces between enemies, dealing [Damage Rate: 80%] Physical Damage to each target. Bounces up to 3 times.

skills.name: Armor Break
skills.description: Piercing shot that reduces enemy armor by 20% for 5 seconds. Deals [Damage Rate: 100%] Physical Damage.

skills.name: Trap
skills.description: Place a trap that triggers when enemies step on it. Deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and slows enemies by 40% for 3 seconds.

skills.name: Quick Load
skills.description: Instantly reload all bullets and gain 30% attack speed for 8 seconds.

skills.name: Concussion Grenade
skills.description: Throw a grenade that explodes on impact, dealing [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage in a 5m radius and stunning enemies for 2 seconds.

skills.name: Blinding Flash
skills.description: Create a bright flash that blinds all enemies in a 8m radius for 4 seconds, reducing their accuracy by 50%.

skills.name: Aim
skills.description: Enter aiming mode for 6 seconds. Gain 25% critical chance and 20% damage increase for all attacks.

skills.name: Scatterblast
skills.description: Fire a spread of pellets in a cone, dealing [Damage Rate: 60%] Physical Damage per pellet. Each enemy can be hit by multiple pellets.

skills.name: Photon Bolt
skills.description: Fire a concentrated energy bolt that pierces through enemies, dealing [Damage Rate: 180%] Magic Damage and creating an explosion at the end dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage in a 4m radius.

skills.name: Snipe
skills.description: Take careful aim and fire a high-damage shot. Deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage with guaranteed critical hit. Cannot be interrupted while aiming.

skills.name: Toxic Shroud
skills.description: Create a toxic cloud that deals [Damage Rate: 80%] Magic Damage per second for 8 seconds. Enemies in the cloud are poisoned and take 15% more damage from all sources.

skills.name: Rapid Fire
skills.description: Channel for 4 seconds, firing bullets rapidly. Each bullet deals [Damage Rate: 40%] Physical Damage. Consumes 1 bullet per 0.2 seconds.

skills.name: Sentinel Barrage
skills.description: Channels for 6s (requires 1+ bullets). Consumes 1 bullet per second, stopping at 0 bullets. Fires a hail of bullets every 0.25s at enemies in a frontal cone, dealing [Damage Rate: 85%] Physical Damage. Damage reduced to as low as 70% on enemies the further away they are. Gains [Target-based Max HP 40%] Shield during channeling. Cannot be interrupted and rotates slowly.

skills.name: Photon Activation
skills.description: Activate photon mode for 15 seconds. All attacks become energy-based, dealing Magic Damage instead of Physical Damage, and gain 25% mana cost reduction for all skills.

skills.name: Deadshot
skills.description: Take perfect aim and fire a devastating shot that deals [Damage Rate: 500%] Physical Damage. If it kills the target, the bullet explodes dealing [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to all enemies within 8m of the original target.

skills.name: Guardian
skills.description: Using a weapon skill increases Damage Resistance by 30% and Control Resistance by 35 for 6s

skills.name: Swing
skills.description: [Basic Attack]: Deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage to enemies. Can cast [Swing] every 4s Deals [Damage Rate: 240%] Physical Damage to all players ([Damage Rate: 480%] Physical Damage to mobs) in a frontal cone

skills.name: Smash
skills.description: [Basic Attack]: Deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage to enemies. Can cast [Smash] every 7s Deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to enemies in range and restores [Healing Rate: 90%] HP to nearby allies. Increases Damage Resistance by 15% for 6s

skills.name: Crushing Smash
skills.description: [Basic Attack]: Deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage to enemies. Can cast [Crushing Smash] every 6s Charges toward target, dealing [Damage Rate: 160%] Physical Damage to enemies in range and inflicting Slow 35% for 3s

skills.name: Frenzied Smash
skills.description: Smashes the ground 4 times. The first three hits deal [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage to players ([Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage to mobs). The final hit deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to players ([Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to mobs) and Knocks Up for 0.5s

skills.name: Binding Smash
skills.description: Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage and inflicting Immobilize for 2.5s to enemies in the area

skills.name: Guardian Field
skills.description: Creates a Guardian Field at the target location that increases allies' Max HP by 25% and grants Immunity to Forced Movement (Pull, Knockback) and Hard Control (Stun, Fear, Freeze, Knockup, Petrify, Sleep). Lasts 5s

skills.name: Field of Silence
skills.description: Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to enemies in range and creates a Field of Silence, lasting 4s. Enemies in the field are Slowed by 25% and Silenced. Once they leave the area, they become immune to the field's Silence for 6s

skills.name: Vengeful Thunder
skills.description: Activates [Vengeful Thunder] on self or an ally. [Vengeful Thunder]: Increases own Damage Resistance by 25% for 8s. While active, when taking damage or dealing direct damage with Basic Attack, calls down lightning at the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 51%] Physical Damage to enemies in range (Internal Cooldown: 0.8s)

skills.name: Unyielding Smash
skills.description: Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to all players ([Damage Rate: 375%] Physical Damage to mobs) in range. Grants [Target-based Max HP 6%] Shield for each enemy hit, lasting 6s. Stacks up to 5 times.

skills.name: Shield Slam
skills.description: Initiates a Raise Shield status for 20s. During this status, gains immunity to control effects and +50% Damage Resistance, with an increased hit box. Can re-cast the skill during this period to deal [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to enemies in range and apply 50% Slow for 3s. The large shield will break after taking [Target-based Max HP 30%] damage, immediately ending the Raise Shield status.

skills.name: Grappling Strike
skills.description: Launches a mechanical hook forward. The first enemy hit is Stunned (ignores Control Resistance) for 1.5s, takes [Damage Rate: 450%] Physical Damage, and is Pulled to the caster

skills.name: Void Slam
skills.description: Slams the ground, dealing [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to up to 15 nearby enemies, dispelling all Buffs from them, reducing their damage output by 50% for 8s, and Silencing them for 3s

skills.name: Pulverizing Slam
skills.description: Hold the skill to charge, up to 3s; damage range increases gradually with charge time and reaches max at 2s. Cannot be interrupted during charging. Every 0.5s during charging, deals [Damage Rate: 80%] Physical Damage to enemies in range. Upon releasing the skill button, if fully charged, pulls enemies in range toward the caster, dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage and applying 40% Slow for 3s. If not fully charged, only deals damage and applies Slow.

skills.name: Thunderclap Impact
skills.description: Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage and inflicting 1.5s Knockup on enemies hit. Creates a thunderstorm field that lasts 6s. Enemies within 7m have their Damage Resistance reduced by 15% and take [Damage Rate: 70%] Physical Damage every second.

skills.name: Void Devour
skills.description: Fires two heavy rounds that create a gravity vortex where they meet. Enemies in the vortex are Slowed by 25% Deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to enemies in the vortex after 1.5s, pulling them to the center and Stunning for 1s

skills.name: Bloodthirst
skills.description: Applies Bloodthirst Mark to up to 5 nearby enemies in a 15m frontal area every 12s, lasting 12s. Weapon skills against marked targets restore 6% of missing HP, deal +5% extra damage, while also granting +10% Attack Speed and +8% Movement Speed for 4s. Stacks up to 3 times. Consumes Bloodthirst Mark when triggered.

skills.name: Jump Slash
skills.description: [Basic Attack]: Deals [Damage Rate: 130%] Physical Damage to enemies. Can cast [Jump Slash] every 6s Performs a powerful leap attack, dealing [Damage Rate: 220%] Physical Damage and reducing Armor by 32 for 4s

skills.name: Cleaving Strike
skills.description: Replaces Basic Attack with [Cleaving Strike]. Deals [Damage Rate: 160%] Physical Damage to enemies in a frontal cone

skills.name: Cyclone Slash
skills.description: [Basic Attack]: Deals [Damage Rate: 130%] Physical Damage to enemies. Can cast [Cyclone Slash] every 5s Deals [Damage Rate: 240%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies and reduces the healing they receive by 15% for 4s

skills.name: Tempest Strike
skills.description: Channels for 3s. Damage Resistance is increased by 25% while channeling. Deals [Damage Rate: 90%] Physical Damage to players ([Damage Rate: 135%] Physical Damage to mobs) every 0.4s. On completion, deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies. Channeling can be ended early to perform the final strike

skills.name: Rock Smash
skills.description: Swings a giant axe to perform Rock Smash, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and Stunning enemies before the caster for 1.2s. Stones deal [Damage Rate: 50%] Physical Damage to those hit and [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage on landing, also inflicting 30% Slow for 4s

skills.name: Primal Rush
skills.description: Charges forward to deal [Damage Rate: 30%] Physical Damage 6 times to up to 5 enemies hit, continuously knocking them back. The final impact deals [Damage Rate: 160%] Physical Damage to enemies in range

skills.name: Axehook
skills.description: Swings an axehook forward to pull up to 5 enemies to the caster, also deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage and inflicts 50% Slow for 4s

skills.name: Rage
skills.description: Enter a berserker rage for 8s, increasing Physical Damage by 30%, Attack Speed by 20%, and Movement Speed by 15%. While in rage, taking damage increases these bonuses by 5% each, stacking up to 5 times

skills.name: Whirlwind Slash
skills.description: Deals [Damage Rate: 50%] Physical Damage to all nearby players ([Damage Rate: 75%] Physical Damage to mobs) every 0.5s for 5s. Can move freely while channeling. Cannot be interrupted, and cannot cancel skill. Upon stopping the whirlwind, deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies. The damage of the final slash increases based on hits while spinning, up to [Damage Rate: 400%] Physical Damage

skills.name: Vortex Toss
skills.description: Throws a massive axe in the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 90%] Physical Damage and knocking back enemies hit along its path. Reduces Damage dealt by 20% for 4s. The axe returns but does not knock back enemies

skills.name: Bonecrusher Leap
skills.description: Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies. Gains [Basic Attack True Damage] and +30% Attack Speed for 6s. Duration extends by 2s for each player (0.6s for each mob) hit, up to an extra 6s. [Basic Attack True Damage]: Basic Attacks deal [Damage Rate: 50%] additional True Damage.

skills.name: Execution
skills.description: Deals [Damage Rate: 300%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies and applies [Grievous Wounds]. Increases to [Damage Rate: 450%] against targets below 40% HP. Hold to charge up, gaining interrupt immunity and +80% Damage Resistance. After 1.5s charge, Skill Damage +150%. [Grievous Wounds]: Reduces healing by 40% for 4s

skills.name: Runic Rebound
skills.description: Throws two axes forward, each dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage to enemies hit. The axes return automatically, dealing [Damage Rate: 120%] Physical Damage to enemies hit. The first enemy hit by each returning axe restores [Healing Rate: 144%] HP

skills.name: Twinstorm
skills.description: Spins toward the target location, reducing the Damage Resistance of enemies hit by 15% for 4s. Attacks each enemy 4 times, each dealing [Damage Rate: 60%] Physical Damage. The final hit deals [Damage Rate: 220%] Physical Damage and knocks enemies up for 1.5s. Creates dual spinning axes that last 6s and deal [Damage Rate: 50%] Physical Damage every 0.5s

skills.name: Bladewheel Throw
skills.description: Launches a spinning bladewheel toward the target location that cuts enemies along the path, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage, and the destination. Spins for 5s, Slowing enemies by 30% and dealing [Damage Rate: 75%] Physical Damage every 0.5s while also inflicting [Grievous Wounds]. Each hit increases the wheel's damage by 10% up to 50%. The wheel returns to the caster afterward. [Grievous Wounds]: Reduces healing by 40% for 4s

skills.name: Aura and Blade
skills.description: Gains [Momentum] every second while in combat, 2 stacks when dealing damage with Basic Attacks, 4 stacks on Critical Hit, 1 stack when taking Basic Attack Damage, and 2 stacks when taking Skill Damage. At 10 [Momentum] stacks, increases [Sword Momentum] by 1 level. [Momentum] lasts 20s. [Sword Momentum] grants +3% Damage, +4% Attack Speed, and +4% Damage Resistance per level, lasting 8s. Stacks up to 6 times.

skills.name: Sword Slash
skills.description: [Basic Attack]: Deals [Damage Rate: 130%] Physical Damage to enemies. Can cast [Sword Slash] every 6s Charges toward an enemy to deal [Damage Rate: 180%] Physical Damage and inflict 40% Slow for 2s

skills.name: Sword Cleave
skills.description: [Basic Attack]: Deals [Damage Rate: 130%] Physical Damage to enemies. Can cast [Sword Cleave] every 5s Deals [Damage Rate: 220%] Physical Damage to surrounding enemies. Grants [Target-based Max HP 3%] Shield for each enemy hit, lasting 4s. Stacks up to 5 times

skills.name: Sword Energy
skills.description: [Basic Attack]: Deals [Damage Rate: 130%] Physical Damage to enemies. Can cast [Sword Energy] every 6s Unleashes sword energy forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 140%] Physical Damage to enemies hit. Increases Movement Speed by 25% for 2s if at least 1 enemy is hit

skills.name: Vacuum Slash
skills.description: Performs 4 forward slashes, each dealing [Damage Rate: 60%] Physical Damage to players ([Damage Rate: 90%] Physical Damage to mobs). The final hit unleashes sword energy forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to all enemies hit

skills.name: Crippling Strike
skills.description: Leaps to the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage and inflicting 50% Slow for 3s to nearby enemies upon landing. Gains [Target-based Max HP 20%] Shield for 4s when hitting at least 1 enemy

skills.name: Power Slash
skills.description: Hold the skill to charge. During charging, immune to control effects and gains +20% Damage Resistance. Deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to enemies in range and inflicts Stun for 0.5s. When fully charged at 1.5s, deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage to enemies in range, inflicting Stun for 1.5s, and releases a shockwave forward that deals [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to hit enemies, applying Slow by 40% for 4s

skills.name: Defensive Slash
