skills.description: Begins Blocking for 3s. While Blocking, reduces Movement Speed but gains control immunity and +70% Damage Resistance. Afterward, deals [Damage Rate: 320%] Physical Damage to nearby enemies and reduces their Armor by 6450% for 4s. Block can be canceled early

skills.name: Heart of Steel
skills.description: Immediately removes all control effects, gains 1 stack of [Sword Momentum], increases Damage Resistance by 25%, and the Attack Speed of the next 3 Basic Attacks by 80% for 8s. Can be used while skills are disabled

skills.name: Tempest Slash
skills.description: Spins toward the target location, dealing [Damage Rate: 75%] Physical Damage to all players ([Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage to mobs) hit. At 3+ Sword Momentum stacks, creates a tornado on arrival, dealing [Damage Rate: 50%] Physical Damage every second for 5s

skills.name: Titan's Stride
skills.description: Gains immunity to Forced Movement (Pull, Knockback). Attack range and Max HP increase based on [Sword Momentum] stacks for 10s (Cannot be dispelled). Can use [Titan's Stride] to deal [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and Knockup enemies for 0.5s. At 3+ stacks, creates a titan aura that Slows enemies by 30% and reduces Attack Speed by 30%

skills.name: Sovereign Strike
skills.description: Knocks enemies back 8m and deals [Damage Rate: 450%] Physical Damage. Reduces Damage dealt based on [Sword Momentum] stacks for 6s. At 3+ stacks, Knockback increased to 12m and Stuns for 2s on collision

skills.name: Force Pierce
skills.description: Unleashes powerful sword energy toward the target direction, dealing [Damage Rate: 300%] Magic Damage to enemies hit. At 1+ Sword Momentum stacks: 30% Slow for 2s. At 2+ stacks: 30% Slow for 2s and Silence for 2s. At 3-6 stacks: 30% Slow for 4s and Silence for 4s. At 3+ stacks: Unleashes 2 extra Sword Energy. Additional Sword Energy beyond the first deals damage equal to 30% of the original damage

skills.name: Overload Slash
skills.description: Briefly charges up and then rushes at the target enemy, inflicting [Heal Block] for 4s and dealing Physical Damage based on [Sword Momentum] stacks. At 3+ stacks, creates an explosion dealing [Damage Rate: 200%] Physical Damage and Stunning for 1.5s. [Heal Block]: Cannot receive healing

skills.name: Thousandfold Strike
skills.description: Leaps to the target location, creating countless blades. Physical Damage scales with [Sword Momentum] stacks. At 3+ stacks, creates two sets of blades forming outward, each dealing [Damage Rate: 150%] Physical Damage and inflicting 1s Knockup

skills.name: Obliteration
skills.description: Dashes forward, dealing [Damage Rate: 250%] Physical Damage to all enemies hit. Reduces Damage Resistance based on [Sword Momentum] stacks for 4s. At 3+ stacks, Pulls enemies to the center on arrival and slashes multiple times over 1.8s, dealing [Damage Rate: 30%] Physical Damage every 0.3s

skills.name: Displacement
skills.description: Grants a [Target-based Max HP 25%] shield lasting 4s and swaps positions with target player

skills.name: Decay
skills.description: Increases Movement Speed by 55%, lasting 5s; creates a path of corruption lasting 4s along movement path. Enemies in the path suffer 35% reduced damage dealt and 30% reduced healing received for 5s

skills.name: Frost
skills.description: Increases Movement Speed by 55% for 5s. Creates a frost path that lasts 4s. Enemies in the path are slowed by 40% and their Attack Speed is reduced by 45% for 2s

skills.name: Flash Step
skills.description: Move 12m in target direction. Restore [Healing Rate: 180%] HP and 25 MP

skills.name: Ghost
skills.description: After 1.5s cast time, enters Ghost Form, increases Movement Speed by 70%, gains immunity to damage and control effects for 3s. Cannot cast other Skills or Attack while in Ghost Form.

skills.name: Berserk
skills.description: Increases Movement Speed by 70% and damage by 20% for 5s. When effect ends, reduces Damage Resistance by 20% for 5s

skills.name: Warding
skills.description: Grants 406 Armor for 6s. While active, any attacker that hits with basic attack or skill damage has their damage reduced by 40% and Movement Speed by 30% for 4s

skills.name: Purify
skills.description: Immediately removes all control effects, restores [Healing Rate: 180%] HP, and grants Control Immunity for 2s. Can be used while skills are disabled.

skills.name: Dispel
skills.description: Launches a Dispel projectile in the target direction that deals [Damage Rate: 120%] Magic Damage to enemies in the impact area, removes all Buffs and Shield effects, and reduces their Physical Damage output by 40% for 6s

skills.name: Repulse
skills.description: Deals [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage to nearby enemies, knocks them back 10m, disarms them, and reduces their Movement Speed by 40% for 4s

skills.name: Mana Font
skills.description: Creates a 7m radius Mana Font around the caster, lasting 6s. Allies within gain +80% Casting Speed and restores 10 MP every second to allies within range

skills.name: Barrier
skills.description: Gains a [Target-based Max HP 45%] shield for 6s. Restores 10 MP each time damage is taken while the shield is active.

skills.name: Panic
skills.description: Creates a panic curse field around the caster that lasts 6s. Enemies within 6m who use skills take [Damage Rate: 200%] Magic Damage and are affected by Fear for 1.5s
